feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
